<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sn_apptmnt_booking_config">
    <sn_apptmnt_booking_config action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <active>true</active>
        <auto_acceptance>true</auto_acceptance>
        <availability_method>number</availability_method>
        <name>Unily Deployment Request</name>
        <portal_view>week</portal_view>
        <script><![CDATA[(function availability(taskRecord, rangeStart, rangeEnd, catalogId, openedFor, groupBy, limit, fullDay) {
	var task = new global.JSON().decode(taskRecord);
	var appointmentBooking = new
	gs.info('AAtask: ' + taskRecord,'AAAAAA');
	gs.info('AArangeStart: ' + rangeStart,'AAAAAA');
	gs.info('AArangeEnd: ' + rangeEnd,'AAAAAA');
	gs.info('AAcatalogId: ' + catalogId,'AAAAAA');
	gs.info('AAopenedfor: ' + openedFor,'AAAAAA');
	gs.info('AAgroupby: ' + groupBy,'AAAAAA');
	gs.info('AAlimit: ' + limit,'AAAAAA');
	gs.info('AAfullDay: ' + fullDay,'AAAAAA');
	sn_apptmnt_booking.AppointmentBookingAvailability(task, rangeStart,
	rangeEnd, catalogId, openedFor, groupBy, limit, fullDay);
	return appointmentBooking.getAppointmentAvailabilitySMConfig();
	
}(taskRecord, rangeStart, rangeEnd, catalogId, openedFor, groupBy, limit, fullDay));

]]></script>
        <sys_created_by>fge.shay</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2018-11-02 14:38:47</sys_created_on>

        <task_table>x_brig3_deployment_deployment_resource</task_table>
    </sn_apptmnt_booking_config>
</record_update>
